participant_1.background:
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.
I want to show my music to the world!
I like a soft bed for my baby.
i have a missing pinky toe.

participant_2.background:
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
i do not like wearing a swimsuit.
I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love.
I am not sure what my family members do for a living.
I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
It is going well thanks for asking! How is yours?
Its going good! I am currently pregnant with my second child.
That is awesome! Congratulations! I am not sure what I would do if I had a kid.
Thanks! I am really excited. I am also working on making organic cat food for my furry friend.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to make my own cat food. I am a nurse and my worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
Oh no! That must have been so difficult. I am sorry to hear that.
Thanks. I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love.
I totally understand that. I am also afraid of losing my passion for things I love.
I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset.
I love to sleep in too! My favorite time of day is probably when I am with my family.
That sounds nice. I am not sure what my family members do for a living.
I am sure they have great jobs
